name: Sunriser - a MiniMicro game
description:
*click inside game area first*

The sky has broken into pieces! Press Space to send the lowest piece high into the sky and restore order. The day cannot break without your help! 

The MiniMicro 1 Page Jam challenges contributors to write  short (~1700 characters) programs in Miniscript. Miniscript runs on a virtual command-line driven pc... a retro lover's passion project, to be sure.

Enjoy,

ShapSnap
